title: Software Engineer
points: Worked on scalable web pages for warehouse management based on Figma specifications using ReactJS, implementing backend microservice changes with Spring Boot, adhering to Agile/SDLC methodologies for requirement analysis, development, testing, and release cycles.
Spearheaded the migration of Stockholm’s inbound frontend codebase from AngularJS to Vue.js, delivering a complete overhaul that improved functionality and performance.
Integrated Tailwind and Bootstrap 3 CSS frameworks to develop responsive, visually appealing web pages, while building reusable CSS utility components using Blibli’s internal libraries.

Authored comprehensive unit tests using Jest, which ensured code quality and boosted code reliability and maintainability. Wrote integration test cases with Playwright, enhancing end-to-end testing coverage and minimizing production bugs.
Optimized code quality by reducing application error rates from 2.5% to 0.5% through continuous refinement and proactive issue resolution.
Facilitated code reviews and mentored new UI interns, fostering adherence to best practices and ensuring high-quality deliverables.
Demonstrated a Proof of Concept (POC) for warehouse layouts using the fabricJS library, showcasing innovative approaches to warehouse design.
Conducted Root Cause Analysis (RCA) for various critical issues, achieving an average resolution time of approximately 2 hours and demonstrating strong proactive problem-solving skills.
Significantly improved code quality, reducing application error rates from 2.5% to 0.5% through continuous refinement.
Conducted thorough code reviews and mentored new interns to foster adherence to best practices.

title: Software Developer Intern
points: Gained proficiency in the Django framework, focusing on the integration between frontend and backend applications.

Developed a secure online voting application using the Django framework, allowing users to vote for specific candidates. Utilized MySQL for efficient data storage and management, ensuring a seamless user experience.
